1.title: Dance, Jimmy Dance/Jimmy and Beezy on the Run
1.plot: Jimmy's horrified to discover that he can't dance, and decides to take lessons from Rudolpho. / After breaking one of Lucius' vases, Jimmy and Beezy go on the run and team up with outlaw Stink the Skunk.

2.title: My Best Friend's a Weavil/Beezy J. Genius
2.plot: Beezy becomes friends with an obsessive weevil, Max, so he can stick it to Lucius. / Beezy gets hit with a special genius bolt, making him smarter than everyone else in Miseryville - including Heloise.

3.title: Air Force None/Panda-Monium
3.plot: Jimmy stows away on Lucius' brand new plane and winds up taking the controls. / Heloise accidentally becomes revered by Pandas, which Jimmy and Beezy use for their own financial gain.

4.title: You Can't Keep a Heinous Down/Terrific Trio
4.plot: Power Squid and Spaghetti Beezy team with new superhero to stop a giant green monster from terrorizing Lucius. / Lucius has to rebuild his entire fortune after Beezy gives it all away in return for lemonade.

5.title: Spring Broke/Zombie Pickle
5.plot: Jimmy and Beezy go on Spring Break, but to the wrong side of Misery Island. / Baked pickle treats turn everyone in Miseryville, except Jimmy, into pickle zombies.

6.title: Bad Luck Jimmy/Misery Hearts
6.plot: Jimmy swallows a giant bad-luck accelerometer and mayhem ensues around him. / Heloise searches out the author of her favorite book to find out the ending, only to discover that it was written by Beezy.

7.title: High School Mule-Sical/Heloise Schmeloise
7.plot: Jimmy tries to help Beezy turn a mule into a star for the annual Heinous Gala. / Jimmy falls in love with Heloise's clone.

8.title: Jimmy New Shoes/What's Up with Heloise?
8.plot: Jimmy trades his shoes in for fancy new ones, then relents and has to reclaim his old shoes. / When Heloise is forced to act like a young lady while her Aunt is visiting, Jimmy and Beezy try to "save" her.

9.title: Everyone Can Whistle/Heads Will Roll
9.plot: Jimmy gets a whistling lesson from Peep, a kid with a hidden agenda and a crush on Heloise. / Heloise sneezes her head off just before she's scheduled to accept a prestigious science award.

10.title: She Loves Me/Heinous vs. Clowns
10.plot: Jimmy and Beezy fight over a "beautiful" damsel in distress, whom Lucius has trapped in a tower for all eternity. / Lucius enlists Jimmy, Beezy and Heloise to fight in his prank war against the clowns.

11.title: Bird Brained/Mysterious Mr. Ten
11.plot: Lucy's prized bird breaks free and it's up to Jimmy, Beezy and Heloise to catch it... or help it escape. / Jimmy tries to break a curse that prevents a spooky hotel owner from laughing.

12.title: Heloise's Secret Admirer/Miseryville Marathon
12.plot: Heloise is excited to have a secret admirer "J2S", but it sadly turns out to be Peep. / Lucius and Beezy enter a Father/Son piggyback marathon in an attempt to beat their arch-rivals, the Weevils.

13.title: Lucius Lost/Something About Herman
13.plot: Lucius and Jimmy are stranded on an island in the middle of Lucius' brand-new pool, while Heloise and Beezy enjoy a picnic. / Heloise poses as a guy so she can infiltrate Jimmy and Beezy's secret "boy stuff" activities.

14.title: Funny Face-Off/A Present for Jez
14.plot: Jimmy loses a funny face-off with the Rodeo Clowns, freezing his face into a frown. / Jimmy tinkers with a compliment doll that Lucius got for Jez, turning it into an insult doll that runs amok.

15.title: Samy's New Gig/The Clean Sneak
15.plot: Jimmy and Beezy try to launch Samy's acting career after Lucius fires him. / Someone's secretly cleaning all of Miseryville, creating the greatest mystery that the town, or Detective Jimmy, have ever seen.

16.title: Six Over Seven/The Outsiders
16.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

17.title: The Great Horn Fairy/The Collectors
17.plot: Jimmy jumps on the Miseryville bandwagon and fakes losing a horn, so he can collect a gold boulder from The Great Horn Fairy. / Jimmy accidentally throws out Beezy's prized collection of chewed gum.

18.title: Hooded Chicken/Make No Allowances
18.plot: Jimmy and Beezy think Heloise is the fabled Hooded Chicken after they finally catch a glimpse of her feet. / Beezy tries to survive on a down-sized allowance and needs Jimmy's help to keep him from blowing it all.

19.title: Generation Text/Snowrilla
19.plot: Lucius and the kids all get trapped inside a Swartzentiger cave with nothing but their cell phones to save them. / Jimmy and Beezy meet the fabled Snowrilla, then accidentally give away his whereabouts to all of Miseryville.

20.title: Going Green/My So-Called Loaf
20.plot: Jimmy and Beezy meet an ultra-cool environmentalist, Thor, who inspires them to clean up Miseryville. / Jimmy makes a sandwich so beautiful that a visiting cowboy wishes to make it his bride.

21.title: Better Sweater/Jimmy on the Spot
21.plot: Heloise knits a love-sweater for Jimmy and a fear-sweater for Beezy, but her plan back-fires when the boys decide to switch sweaters. / Jimmy is a contestant on a televised game-show that tests his goodness.

22.title: Jimmy's Life Goal/Heinous on Ice
22.plot: Jimmy convinces Heloise to help him be a better soccer goalie, but then ditches her as soon as Wreckem comes calling. / Lucius VI is defrosted on his birthday and Lucius VII gives him Jimmy as his present.

23.title: Beezy 2.0/Toast Busters
23.plot: Deciding that Jimmy is a bad influence on his son, Lucius gets him out of the way. / An elderly ghost couple haunts Jimmy, demanding the return of their toaster that Lucius borrowed many years ago.

24.title: Weavil Day/Heloise's Rival
24.plot: Jimmy and Beezy infiltrate Weavil Day, sparking a battle between Lucius and Chief Weavil. / A mean rich girl rivals Heloise for the title "Queen of Mean", as well as Jimmy's attention.

25.title: Bubble Poodle/Cerbee Come Home
25.plot: The citizens of Miseryville are all temporarily blinded, giving Jimmy the chance to finally do all of the things on his list. / Lucius adopts Cerbee after the pooch saves his life, leaving Jimmy without his beloved dog.

26.title: Good Old Jimmy/Slime, Slimy, Slimiest
26.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

1.title: Pop-Sicles/Chez Beezy
1.plot: When Lucius and Beezy start squabbling more than ever, Jimmy comes up with a fool-proof plan for an impromptu, rift-healing reunion. / When Jimmy and Beezy take over the kitchen at Chez Garbage, guess who ends up doing all the work?

2.title: I've Totally Shredded My Cheese/Heloise's Wish List
2.plot: After Jimmy's new catch-phrase launches him into superstardom, Lucius decides he wants in on the craze. / When Lucius fires Heloise, Jimmy makes her a list of all the fun things she can now do.

3.title: Spew Tube/Monster Mutt
3.plot: When Heloise posts an embarrassing video of Lucius for all of Miseryville's amusement, Jimmy must restore Lucius' villainous reputation. / Heloise switches Beezy's and Cerbee's bodies and Jimmy must convince them to switch back.

4.title: A Cold Day in Miseryville/Mount Misery
4.plot: When Jimmy tells Heloise about the magic of snow, she turns Miseryville into a winter wonderland. / When Lucius plans to carve his likeness onto the face of Mount Misery, Jimmy rushes to help the Weavils.

5.title: Heat Blanket Jimmy/Cellphone-it-is
5.plot: When Lucius turns the heat up to record-breaking levels, Jimmy uses it as an excuse to throw a rockin' beach party. / When cellphones are banned, Jimmy turns to Dr. Scientist to help cure Beezy of his mobile-mania.

6.title: Power Squid and Spaghetti Beezy/The Big Date
6.plot: Jimmy mistakenly gets off in the bad part of Clownburg and finds himself hassled by ill-tempered clowns. / When an emergency at Misery Inc. keeps Lucius from a date with Jez, he bribes Jimmy to keep her busy.

7.title: Carnival Lucius/Baby Boom
7.plot: Lucius is certain that Heloise's new invention will cause untold levels of misery. / In order to score tickets to see 'Runny and the Nosebleeds', Beezy and Jimmy get jobs babysitting the Molotov's bratty munchkins.

8.title: Way Below Par/Jimmy Matchmaker
8.plot: Jimmy signs up and actually starts winning the Miseryville golf tournament. / Jimmy plays matchmaker to find Beezy a date to Lucius' statue-unveiling ceremony.

9.title: The Competition/Jimmy, Don't Be a Hero
9.plot: Jimmy is fed up with Heloise and Beezy's constant bickering. / Jimmy has saved Lucius' life. No Heinous has ever owed anyone anything, so Lucy must endanger Jimmy's life and rid himself of his debt by saving him.

10.title: A Hair-Brained Idea/Ghost Smackers
10.plot: Jez wants Lucius to try a youthful new look, so he tricks Jimmy into swapping hairstyles. / When the ghost of pizza-crusts-past starts haunting Beezy, it's up to Jimmy to make things right.

11.title: Jimmy Gets a 'Stache/The Butley Did It
11.plot: Jimmy is jealous when he's the only one in Miseryville who can't grow a moustache. / Beezy hires a butler to clean his room, but he soon has his new manservant living his entire life for him.

12.title: The Product Tester/Invasion of the Weavils
12.plot: Lucius knows that if one of his new products can make über-optimist Jimmy miserable, he'll have a surefire winner on his devious hands. / Weavils are part weasel, all evil, and after a feigned injury, one of the wily creatures has tricked its way into Jimmy's home.

13.title: Catalogue of Misery/Bend It Like Wreckem
13.plot: The new Misery Inc. catalogue is out, and Jimmy, thinking that the stuff is free, orders up every item. / In a quest to snag the coveted hoof prints of Wreckem, their favourite soccer star, Jimmy and Beezy inadvertently knock out their hero just before the big match.

14.title: Wish You Weren't Here/Cerbee in Love
14.plot: When Jimmy introduces a stressed-out Lucius to the foreign concept of a "vacation," the dictator reluctantly agrees to the pleasure cruise. / Heloise, Jimmy and Beezy attempt to unite Cerbee with his true love.

15.title: The Racing Bug/Too Many Jimmys
15.plot: After two incredibly competitive racecar driver fleas infest Jimmy's and Beezy's brains, the boys vie for title of fastest Miseryvillian. / When his busy pals leave him with no one to hang out with, Jimmy turns to Heloise's latest contraption: the 'People Copier.'

16.title: Rear Pickle/Clowns Gone Wild
16.plot: Jimmy's new neighbor seems sweet enough, but Two-Shoes can't shake the suspicion that this little lady is really the thing he fears most... a giant pickle. / Jimmy and Beezy desperately want to join the Rodeo Clown's 'Cool Clown Club.'

17.title: The Masked Jackhammer/The Big Drip
17.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

18.title: Best Prank Ever/Bad Horn Day
18.plot: It's Lucius Fools Day, the one day a year when Lucy gets to inflict more misery than usual through various mean-spirited pranks. / After accidentally lopping off Lucius' prize-winning horns, Jimmy must turn to one of Heloise's concoctions to save his skin in time for the annual 'Golden Horn Awards.'

19.title: Night in the Heinous Museum/I Married a Weavil
19.plot: When the Heinous Museum is under attack, Heloise and Jimmy are pressed into service as security guards to protect Lucius' most prized possession...a Little League bowling trophy. / Lucius and the Weavils sign a peace treaty forcing Beezy to marry the unsightly Princess Weavil.

20.title: Meet the Gnomans/There's Always a Hiccup!
20.plot: Beezy accidentally crushes the commanding officer of the Gnomans. / When Heloise catches a mean case of the hiccups, the boys must (for once) take matters into their own hands.

21.title: I Am Jimmy/Happy Birthday Lucius
21.plot: Jimmy is the only one awake after virtually all of Miseryville goes into hibernation. / After Lucius loses his voice barking orders for his birthday party preparations, Jimmy's the only one who can interpret the instructions.

22.title: Fused Together/Bus Driving BFF
22.plot: Jimmy's been spending all his time with Beezy and showing up late to hang out with Heloise. / When an obsessed bus driver adopts Jimmy as his new best friend, it's all buses, all the time.

23.title: Pet Rockey/Rocket Jimmy
23.plot: Beezy is jealous when his new pet rock favors Jimmy, but "Rocky" turns out to be more monster than mineral. / In order to live out his dream of space travel, Jimmy poses as Molotov.

24.title: No Rules, Rulez Jimmy/Best Bud Battle
24.plot: Jimmy and Beezy take to nature when they decide there are too many rules in Miseryville. / When Cerbee runs off with Jimmy's home on the end of his leash, Heloise and Beezy face off over who gets to host Jimmy as their houseguest.

25.title: Heloise's Big Secret/Jimmy in the Big House
25.plot: Heloise is irate when Jimmy and Beezy find, steal, and flaunt her secret stash of dolls. / In order to bust Cerbee out of an animals-only jail, Jimmy and Beezy dress up as pandas and try to get themselves arrested.

26.title: Scent of a Heinous/There Will Be Chocolate
26.plot: Lucius launches "Heinous," a height-boosting new fragrance. / When Jimmy, Heloise, and Beezy discover the exclusive Heinous Chocolate Reserve, they go nuts.

imdb.plot outline: The series follows the adventures of 14-year-old Jimmy, a happy-go-lucky teen who makes it his mission to find fun everywhere he goes. This is a challenge because Jimmy lives in Miseryville, the unhappiest town around, run by the megalomaniacal Lucius Heinous the Seventh. Miseryville has one main industry: Misery Inc., purveyors of putrid products guaranteed to cause grief; and they do not come with a money back guarantee. Along with his best friends Heloise (part-time genius, full-time soul-crusher who secretly adores him) and Beezy (adventure lover, couch potato, and Jimmy's definitive best friend), Jimmy is determined to surf past all obstacles and bring his infectious enthusiasm to the whole town.
imdb.title: Jimmy Two-Shoes

production companies.name: Bell Broadcast and New Media Fund

plot: Animated series featuring a thrill-seeking teenager who endeavors to make Miseryville a fun, happy and exciting place with aid from his two best friends.::Anonymous

The series follows the adventures of 14-year-old Jimmy, a happy-go-lucky teen who makes it his mission to find fun everywhere he goes. This is a challenge because Jimmy lives in Miseryville, the unhappiest town around, run by the megalomaniacal Lucius Heinous the Seventh. Miseryville has one main industry: Misery Inc., purveyors of putrid products guaranteed to cause grief; and they do not come with a money back guarantee. Along with his best friends Heloise (part-time genius, full-time soul-crusher who secretly adores him) and Beezy (adventure lover, couch potato, and Jimmy's definitive best friend), Jimmy is determined to surf past all obstacles and bring his infectious enthusiasm to the whole town.::Anonymous
